content.rendered:
Directed by Jibu Jacob.

Written by M. Sindhuraj.

Cast Mohanlal(Ulahannan aka Unnachan). Meena(Annie Ulahannan aka Aami). Aima Sebastian(Jini Ulahannan). Sanoop Santhosh(Jerry Ulahannan). Anoop Menon(Venukuttan). Alencier Ley Lopez(Jacob). Kalabhavan Shajohn(Monayi). Neha Saxena(Julie). Rahul Madhav(Josemon). Sudheer Karamana(Chalakkan). Srindaa(Latha (as Srinda Ashab)). Suraj Venjaramoodu(Thilothaman (as Suraaj Venjarammoodu)) . Leena Antony(Annyamma’s Mother). Reena Bashir(Ulahannan’s Classmate). Resmi Boban(Alice). Trichur Elsi(Reethamma). Ganapathi(Jithin). Sasi Kalinga(Shivan). Antony Kochi(Ulahannan’s Father). Suresh Krishna(Augustine). Lishoy(Dasan). Joy Mathew(Ulahannan’s Friend). Meghanadhan(Prabhakaran). Ambika Mohan(Priya’s Mother). Nandu(Priya’s Father).Indian Pallassery. Bindu Panikkar(Girija). Rajesh Paravoor(Benny). Manju Pathrose(Lillykutty (as Manju Sunichen)). Kottayam Purushan(Manoharan Pillai). Kumarakom Raghunath(MLA). Bindu Ramakrishnan(Ulahannan’s Mother). Sohan Seenulal(Babu). Sharafudheen(Reji). Asha Sharath(Indulekha (Cameo)). Revathy Sivakumar(Priya)

Language Malayalam.

Producer Sophia Paul.

Production Weekend Blockbusters.
